modName: Read Books Aloud - Various Audio Book Files
summary: A collection of various audio book files to use with Read Books Aloud.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][u]Description[/u]
[/size]
After finding out that [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35399/?]Book Covers Skyrim[/url] added support for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46088/?]Read Books Aloud[/url] I was more than happy to finally add it to my load order.
Unfortunately, the only available Audio Book files I could find where the basic text-to-speech files generated by [b]Sjors Boomschors. 
[/b]While those certainly do a well enough job, TTS-programms often lack the vocabulary of the ingame-universe to do a proper pronunciation of things like "Tsaesci", "daedric" and "Jyggalag".

So I started downloading and converting  for me personally pleasing Book Reading from Youtube, mainly for personal use, at least to bridge the time till more professional audio book files are available. (Just to make sure, the unprofessional in this equation is me, not the voice actors.)


[u][size=3]Books Covered[/size]

[/u][i]GamerPoets[/i]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=29tOUAAvIRU&index=3&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]16 Accords of Madness : Volume XII[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t1DorRYpv_k&index=4&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 1 : Morning Star
[/url][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XT2odt83BeA&index=5&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 2 : Sun's Dawn[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IPJ07yG81qI&index=6&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 3 : First Seed[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i2iKLU5CDWA&index=7&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 4 : Rains Hand[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nF-kcTyRSQY&index=8&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 5 : Second Seed[/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1fUvn_cZSng&index=9&list=PLlN8weLk86XjB0vcsWawVi8jH39UwD943]2920 Volume 6 : Mid Year[/url]

[i]Slothability[/i]

Installation[/size]

Install the Main file of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46088/?]Read Books Aloud[/url] - Optional: Install also the Audio Book Files. These will in some circumstances compete with my files, let my Mod overwrite (Mod Organizer Users: Give my files a higher priority.)
Install my files into the Data folder 


[size=3][u]Manual D[/u][u]einstallation[/u][/size]

Delete the files found under data/sound/fx/readbooksaloud


[u][size=3]Credit[/size]
[/u][u]
• Chesko the original Creator of Read Books Aloud
• Sjors Boomschors for his expansion of Read Books Aloud and in his function as curator
[u]• [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/gamerpoets]Gamer Poets[/url] for his readings of "16 Accords of Madness : Volume XII" and "2920" Volume 1-6
[/u][/u][u][u]• [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVdbzKdOdAYevglAyQcmS2w]Slothability[/url] for his readings of "16 Accords of Madness : Volume VI" and [/u][/u][u][u]"16 Accords of Madness : Volume I[/u][/u][u][u]X"[/u][/u][u]
[/u][u][u]• [url=https://www.youtube.com/user/erikkfi/featured]Roy Kelly[/url] for his readings of "[/u][/u][u]Night Falls on Sentinel", [/u][u]"Surfeit of Thieves", [u]"The Locked Room", [/u][/u][u]"A Tragedy in Black", 
[/u][u][u] "Ruminations on the Elder Scrolls", [u]"Forge, Hammer and Anvil", [u]"The Woodcutter's Wife", [u]"Troll Slaying" and [u]"Myths of Sheogorath"[/u][/u][/u][/u][/u][/u]
author: Wrayne
